name: COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent v. Mark BROWN, Petitioner
name_abbreviation: Court of Common Pleas v. Brown

parties: COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent v. Mark BROWN, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 23rd day of September, 2011, the Application for Leave to File Original Process and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief are GRANTED. The Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County is directed to dispose of Petitioner’s pending motions for credit for time served within 90 days of this order.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
29 A.3d 369
COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent v. Mark BROWN, Petitioner.
No. 27 EM 2011.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 23, 2011.
